summary: Provides utilities to compile Cython source snippets at runtime, turning them into callable Python functions. It manages a compilation context, caches generated extensions, resolves unbound identifiers, and handles code preprocessing such as indentation stripping and type safety checks.
business_intent: Allow developers to embed high‑performance Cython code directly within Python programs without a separate build step, accelerating performance‑critical sections while preserving the flexibility of dynamic execution.
